name: Five Nights At Freddy's (itch) (jreyes4127)
description:
Here's a 99.9% accurate FNAF remake on itch.io! I had this game on my scratch profile for over 2 years and finally got to share it(well, as close as i could)!
Original by @RHF5
100% made in scratch
Uploaded with turbowarp

Instructions

Mouse for almost everything
Space to get the ____ off the warning screen
0 to cheat
Have fun!
